name: Piccolo
body:
# Brought to you by Team M.A.C.
***

Piccolo is a lightweight rom based on ICS sourcecode, only the most necessary things are implemented.
It contains some functions from AOKP/CM9/CNA, like overclocking functions and lockscreen shortcuts.
More info will be added later
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
